text: You liang ge qingnian he ta yitong ru yu, zhege shuo:“Wo que yi meng jian wo ji putao zhi (niangjiu).” Nage shuo:“Wo que yi meng jian wo de tou shang dingzhe yige da bing, zhong niao fei lai qian ta. Qing ni jiang women de meng zhao de jieshi gaosu women, women dique renwei ni shi xingshan de.”
